name: Those who dig
description:
Hello =D

Those who dig is a roguelite made in one week for the Kindred Community Jam. The theme was "Death is a new beginning".

There are three different atmospheres with their respective musics. When you die, you keep the upgrades you unlocked.

There's a boss to defeat after 12 levels.

Team

-> Asue : game developer

-> Oxalotte : composed all the musics

Credits

-> Portal : Elthen's Pixel Art Shop

-> Enemies : 0x72
